column4: my dvd drive isnt being read but used to work. are there any common reasons for this?
please check your power supply to the drive, open your cpu
is there anything on the cmputer that could be done first before i have to open my computer up?
that was just for your information , now we have to work on what you already got, can you play anything on it, any sound or nothing at all?
no, you gotta open it buddy
i can suggest you something, try thing, hwinfo and tell me output (in terminal)
good, then do sudo hwinfo --short and tell me output where it says /dev/sr0
it should be listed right under /dev/sda
if it is not there that means ,1. it does not take power, 2, its ide/sata cable dies 3. it itself died, so that means open up your computer
